text: Cissé Mariam Kaïdama Sidibé (4 January 1948 – 6 November 2021) was the Prime Minister of Mali from 2011 to 2012. She was the first woman to be appointed to the position in the country's history. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Mali
title: Cissé Mariam Kaïdama Sidibé
